>
[Reptile Speaker](/Feats.aspx?ID=5637) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=760" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 26 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You hear the sounds of reptiles as language. You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) skill with [animals](/Traits.aspx?ID=531) that are reptiles (the GM determines which animals count as reptiles).
